definitions.meaning:
the rate at which goods are produced, and the amount produced, especially in relation to the work, time, and money needed to produce them
生产率，生产效率; 生产量，生产力:

examples.content:
high/improved/increased productivity 
高的╱提高了的╱增长了的生产率

Wage rates depend on levels of productivity. 
工资水平取决于生产量的多寡。
